resources.string: What"'"s band aid, self repair and refactored solution?
You must answer the questionnaire to diagnose your team or manager and get treatment recommendation from us
Band Aid is a short-term fix or coping strategy for those in the midst of the antipattern who have neither the time nor influence to refactor it properly.
Self Repair is a first step for someone perpetuating the antipattern - how you can help yourself improve.

Refactoring is changes that should be made to remedy the situation and their rationale. Sometimes these are under the control of an individual, but often they involve cultural or institutional changes.

You are going to answer questionnaire for your manager and your team culture. You can detect your team"'"s antipatterns and we will give you some recommendation to refactor them. Let"'"s make a better future together!

You are going to answer questionnaire about your member. You can detect your team member"'"s antipatterns and we will give you some recommendation to refactor him/her. Let"'"s make a better future together.

Likelihood and severity is a part of qualitative risk analysis process. Risk analysis is the process of prioritizing risks based on the probability of the risk occurring and the impact it would have on the project.
Likelihood, also named as probability, shows how likely the antipatterns happen in software development process (SDP). Severity, also named as impact, shows how bad it is if it happens.
Orang yang suka mengurang-ngurangi pekerjaan, seringkali karena memiliki agenda pribadi yang seringkali tersembunyi (hidden agenda).
Orang yang menjadi andalan di dalam organisasi sehingga dijadikan senjata utama dalam segala permasalahan.
If you"'"re a project manager and want to evaluate your member
If you"'"re a team member and want to evaluate your manager and team
This is your current problem found
Click on antipatterns to see detail solutions
